title: Default Values Not Displayed in 'Show Report Parameters' Dialog
description: When accessing the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog, default values for report parameters are not visible.
OB: Default values for report parameters are not displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
EB: Default values for report parameters should be visible in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog when accessing it.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for these report parameters.
3. Drag these report parameters to the Layout.
4. Access the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog.
